tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We've been visiting Giggles Dental Care for the past two years for my son's braces. Dr. Jyothirmai, Dr. Deepesh, and Dr. Imran have all been very cordial, thoroughly explaining each procedure. My son feels very comfortable at the clinic. Recently, my mother also went there for  extraction procedure. The team explained everything in detail and made her feel very comfortable during the process. I highly recommend Giggles Dental Clinic.
reply_text: Thank you sir for your kind and encouraging words.  We always strive to provide a warm and welcoming atmosphere where you feel comfortable and cared. We tailor our treatments to your unique needs and have all the advanced equipment like digital scanners, digital work flow, invisalign to name a few. Happy to help. Take care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My visit at giggles dental clinic was excellent. It was nice experience with dr. Jyothirmai. Giggles dental care has a best doctor and good ambience. They have a advance equipment for dental treatment. They followed all the safety regulations while treatment, hygiene is properly maintained, she is very kind and explaining things very nicely about the treatment. I am very happy with the treatment and the doctor. 

I suggest anyone who wanted to go for all the dental problems . ** ** *** **** ********
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. At giggles we have always worked to provide friendly, personalised care  in a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Glad we could help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I have been going to Giggles Dental for ~2 years now and it’s been a great experience. Dr. Jyothi is very thorough and really builds great relationships with her patients. She is always kind to educate us about any issues and spends enough time, unlike many other doctors who are usually in a hurry. I would highly recommend!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words! Glad to know you were well-informed and comfortable during your visit. Providing quality care and education is essential to us, and it's wonderful to know that you felt valued and understood. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, we're here to help. Wishing you the best in health!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Giggles dental clinic today after multiple offlines sessions with Jyoti Ma'am.Was having hard time eating as there was some pain in the upper jaw section. Even with the ongoing pandemic she agreed to meet me the next day. No wait time at all.She did a full checkup, showed me the xray results on tehnscreen which is right on top of the operating area.Exaplined all the issues to me - regarding my brdige, small cavities that were forming, plaque formation etc. Post explaining all the current issues she then moved on to carefully explaining and planning our a complete dental hygiene regime for me. I realised that why it is important to go the dentist regularly cause we may feel we are doing everything right but there is a reason why they are the specialists.Have visited many dental clinics before but giggles and Jyoti maam are league apart. Extreme care is taken to ensure that the clinic is safe during the pandemic. If you require dental examiniation Giggles should be your fisrt stopJyoti ma'am is fantastic!!P. S. : Will add more post my complete treatment.
reply_text: Thank you for the compliments and taking out your precious  time  to convey the kind words. It was my absolute  pleasure  to have you at  Giggles Dental. Preventive care is the backbone of any good treatment plan. Covid safety protocols likeedical grade air Purifiers,  uv lights etc are the need of the hour. Thank you again for recommending  us. Looking forward to the treatment  sessions. Take care. Stay safe.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Oral Rehabilitation,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Cast Partial Denture,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
I was impressed with the way Dr Jyothirmai handled the challenges of full mouth rehabilitation for my mother-in-law who is around 80 years old. Her oral health condition was in a bad state and her teeth were almost beyond redemption.

The Dr did a great job in rectifying all issues by doing full mouth rehabilitation, RCT, tooth extraction, bite correction, diita scan, root planning, providing crown and bridge, cast partial denture and bite correction.

I am thoroughly satisfied with the way the treatment was performed despite complex challenges.
reply_text: Thank you sir for the kind words. It was our pleasure. We are happy that the long journey  has been fruitful. Thank you for your patience. Glad we could help. Take care.
